bug.author: TobyRoseman
bug.summary: API Docs: tc.config page missing link for set_log_level
bug.description: The <denchmark-link:https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/api/turicreate.utils.html>API doc page for tc.config</denchmark-link> is missing a link .

comments.comment: The docstring for this function could also use a little work. The first two lines seem to contradict each other. Also what is the default values? And what are the meanings of the values between zero and eight?
